description.narrative: The project will scale-up and transfer a successful high-value horticulture business model built on (i) the introduction of climate-controlled greenhouse technology in tropical highlands in Asia, and (ii) the integration of its business downstream into distribution in domestic and export markets. ?The flower business of the company will be scaled up in Viet Nam and the PRC, and will be introduced in Indonesia. The business model will be replicated for vegetable production in Viet Nam.

title.narrative: Faster Approach to Small Nonsovereign Transactions (FAST) Report

description.narrative: High-value horticulture business model scaled-up and transferred to new DMCs

title.narrative: Faster Approach to Small Nonsovereign Transactions (FAST) Report
Exports of high-value horticulture products from Indonesia reach $3 million (2015 baseline: 0)

description.narrative: High-value horticulture business model scaled-up and transferred to new DMCs

title.narrative: Agripacific and contract farmer land improved through greenhouse investment including drip irrigation reaches 230 hectares (2015 baseline: 140 hectares)

description.narrative: High-value horticulture business model scaled-up and transferred to new DMCs

title.narrative: Local sales of high-value horticulture products in Viet Nam reach $40 million (2015 baseline: $21 million)

description.narrative: High-value horticulture business model scaled-up and transferred to new DMCs

title.narrative: Number of farmers involved in contract farming with Agripacific reaches 750 (including at least 65% women) (2014 baseline: 300, of which 60% are women)

description.narrative: High-value horticulture business model scaled-up and transferred to new DMCs

title.narrative: Number of Agripacific employees increases to 4,000 (including at least 65% women) (2015 baseline: 3,000, of which 60% are women)

description.narrative: High-value horticulture business model scaled-up and transferred to new DMCs

title.narrative: Local sales of high-value horticulture products in PRC reach $9 million (2015 baseline: $4 million)

description.narrative: High-value horticulture business model scaled-up and transferred to new DMCs

title.narrative: Exports of high-value horticulture products from Viet Nam reach $65 million (2015 baseline: $52 million)

description.narrative: High-value horticulture business model scaled-up and transferred to new DMCs

title.narrative: Proportion of women amongst Agripacific supervisors and managers reaches 63% (2014 baseline: 53%)

description.narrative: High-value horticulture business model scaled-up and transferred to new DMCs
